content:
‚úÖ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Nice!
Good for practicing pathfinding and BFS/DFS. (I used BFS.)
The number of test cases is a nightmare, though.

‚úÖ Approved the contribution.
Comment: like others said in comments, fun and not hard twist to graph search

Nice one !
I'm just not sure if so many tests are necessary ;)

That was fun.

Unfortunately just realized I don't have enough level to approve.

‚úÖ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Fun twist to DFS
I haven't reviewed the contribution yet, but I was curious: why did you go with the name "Serpents and Vines" instead of the more familiar "Snakes and Ladders"? Just wondering.

Test Cases to do:
1. Small Board‚úîÔ∏è
2. Medium Board ‚úîÔ∏è
3. Large Board ‚úîÔ∏è

4. Small Few snakes+ladders ‚úîÔ∏è
5. Medium Few snakes+ladders ‚úîÔ∏è
6. Large Grid Few snakes+ladders ‚úîÔ∏è

7. Small board, small die ‚úîÔ∏è
8. Small board, large die ‚úîÔ∏è
9. Large board, large die ‚úîÔ∏è
10. Large board, small die ‚úîÔ∏è

11. Non-square small ‚úîÔ∏è
12. Non-square medium ‚úîÔ∏è
13. Non-square large ‚úîÔ∏è
14. Tiny grid ‚úîÔ∏è

15. No ladders only snakes (s or nq) ‚úîÔ∏è
16. No snakes only ladders  (s or nq) ‚úîÔ∏è
17. Standard board - No snakes or ladders ‚úîÔ∏è
18. 1x?? Board - No snakes or ladders ‚úîÔ∏è

19. No chain detector ‚úîÔ∏è
20. Ladder directly to the final tile. ‚úîÔ∏è

21. Lots of snakes or ladders ‚úîÔ∏è
22. Lots of snakes or ladders. (Very Horizontal)‚úîÔ∏è
23. Lots of snakes or ladders (Very Vertical)‚úîÔ∏è

24. Include ladder to snake to ladder to end.‚úîÔ∏è
25. Include ladder to snake to ladder to end 2.‚úîÔ∏è

No reason other than to be different. I had it as that originally then decided to change it. Although, I do keep writing snakes and ladders instead, so I suppose it's worth changing it back. And, the name and rules will be understood better...

The contribution guidelines on test cases ( https://www.codingame.com/playgrounds/40701/help-center/test-cases#guidelines ) include the following point:

‚Ä¢ Test cases should cover all specifications.
The more tests, the better.

In other words, having many test cases is encouraged, as long as each one serves a clear purpose by covering a distinct aspect of the puzzle. It's not about quantity for its own sake, but about thorough and meaningful coverage.

Ok

Oh, and can you answer my question in the "Help solve anything" discord section? Thanks.

Your contribution will fill the void! üòÜ
https://www.codingame.com/forum/t/snakes-and-ladders-puzzle-discussion/54

Goal
* "Alternating horizontal directions" works, but you may also consider using "a zigzag manner" instead.

* Please change "A n-sided" to "An n-sided".

* Consider deleting "for players" or changing that to "by a player".

Cases
* Empty Board (validator): Please delete the trailing newline in input.

Thanks.
